CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 2, 1959, pg. 13, reads: "Love's Labor's Lost...Sometimes Home is Where the Heart Remains - Old Ball Homestead - The old homestead of the Ball family, now symbolized in Mrs. Florence Ball Jones. This home was recently remodeled and renovated and is occupied."
TitMainTitle: Two story house with hexagon patterned asphalt siding, and side lot with ramshackle wooden fence, possibly Hill District
